meanings.sent1: She wanted to go to the party; howbeit, she had to finish her homework first.
meanings.sent2: He was tired; howbeit, he continued to work hard.
meanings.sent3: The cat wanted to play outside; howbeit, it started raining.
meanings.sent4: The team was losing the game; howbeit, they never gave up.
meanings.sent5: The sun was shining brightly; howbeit, the air was still chilly.
